title: Passion
text: Technology has been a great part of my life for as long as I can remember. The only logical choice was to become a IT specialist.

title: Agility
text: Being able to quickly respond to today's changing environment are paramount to any business relationship.

title: Trust
text: Working hand in hand with clients as Business analyst has taught me of great importance of trust in business.

title: Communication
text: I find that open communication is the key to efficient product delivery as well as maintaining successful relationship.
